item.description:
Now that the weather is warming up it is time to get out and enjoy ourselves!

Let's meet for a round of Mini golf and after the highly competitive contest is done we will have some ice cream to either celebrate our victory or drown our sorrows....after all ice cream makes everything better!

We will meet at 7:00 in front of the entrance to the Mini Golf....

Hope to see you all there!
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet in front of the Mini Golf
item.name: Mini Golf and Ice Cream at Kimball's
